# tf.keras.datasets.reuters.get_word_index


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/datasets/reuters/get_word_index">

Retrieves the dictionary mapping word indices back to words.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/datasets/reuters/get_word_index"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.datasets.reuters.get_word_index</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/datasets/reuters/get_word_index"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.datasets.reuters.get_word_index</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.datasets.reuters.get_word_index(path='reuters_word_index.json')
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`path`</b>: where to cache the data (relative to `~/.keras/dataset`).


#### Returns:

The word index dictionary.
